about.title: About Us
about.discretionEn: At Survey Infinity, we believe that curiosity and under standing drive progress. We're on a mission to help organizations turn feedback into transformative action.

sec1.title: Our Vision
sec1.paragraph: At Survey Infinity, we envision a world where asking the right questions leads to limitless growth, innovation, and connection.

sec2.title: Our Mission
sec2.paragraph: To make it easy for everyone — from small businesses to global enterprises — to create surveys, collect feedback, and act on real data with confidence and clarity.

sec1.title: Purpose-driven
sec1.description: We believe that understanding people is the key to creating positive change in organizations, communities, and around the world

sec2.title: Inclusive
sec2.description: We're committed to building products and a company culture that are accessible and equitable for everyone,

sec3.title: Collaborative
sec3.description: We believe the best outcomes happen when teams work together, sharing insights and expertise to solve complex

secStory.title: Our Story
secStory.description: Founded in 2010, Survey Infinity began with a simple idea: to make it easy for anyone to collect and learn from feedback. Today, we've grown into a global leader in  survey software, helping millions of customers across 190+ countries turn curiosity into action.Our platform is designed to give everyone—from individuals to large enterprises—the tools they need to ask questions, analyze responses, and make better decisions.

subSec.title: Meet Our Leadership
subSec.description: The talented people behind Survey Infinity who are passionate about helping organizations harness the power of feedback

Questions.Yes: Yes, you can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan at any time. If you upgrade, the new features will be available immediately. If you downgrade, the changes will take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.

featuresHeader.description: An integrated platform for creating and managing surveys with advanced tools and detailed analytics. Designed specifically for Arabic users.

faqs.faqsParagraph: Have questions about creating surveys, quizzes, or collecting responses? We've got answers! Below are some common questions and helpful responses to get you started with Survey Infinity.

howItWorks.title: How Survey Infinity Works
howItWorks.q1: How can I create a new survey or quiz?
howItWorks.a1: You can create a new survey or quiz by clicking the 'Create Survey' button on your dashboard and following the simple step-by-step builder.
howItWorks.a2: Yes, Survey Infinity allows you to enable anonymous responses in the survey settings, so participant identities are not recorded.
howItWorks.q3: Is it possible to add logic or conditional questions?
howItWorks.a3: Absolutely! You can use our question logic feature to show or skip questions based on previous answers.

account.title: Account & Access
account.q1: Do I need to create an account to use Survey Infinity?
account.a1: Yes, you'll need to sign up for a free account to create and manage your surveys.
account.q2: Can I collaborate with my team on a survey?
account.a2: Yes, you can invite team members to collaborate, edit, and manage surveys together in real-time.

customization.title: Customization & Design
customization.q1: Can I use my own branding?
customization.a1: Yes! You can customize your surveys with your logo, colors, and even custom domain settings.
customization.a2: Absolutely. All surveys are responsive and optimized for both mobile and desktop devices.

results.title: Results & Reporting
results.q1: How do I view survey results?
results.a1: You can view results in real-time through the analytics dashboard, which provides charts, graphs, and individual responses.
results.q2: Can I share the results with others?
results.a2: Yes, you can export your results or share a live results link with stakeholders.

contact.title: Get in Touch with Us
contact.description: Have a question, suggestion, or need help? We're here to support you

whyChooseUs.cardDescription2: Easily modify templates to match your needs
whyChooseUs.cardDescription3: Get powerful insights from your survey responses

faqSection.subTitle: Every thing you need to know about creating surveys
faqSection.faqQuestion1: How do I create my first survey?
faqSection.faqAnswer1: Simply sign up, choose from our templates or start from scratch. Our intuitive builder lets you drag and drop questions, customize designs, and share your survey in minutes.
faqSection.faqAnswer2: Yes! We use enterprise-grade security measures to protect your data. All responses are encrypted and stored securely on our servers.
faqSection.faqQuestion3: How can I analyze my results?
faqSection.faqAnswer3: Our platform provides real-time analytics, custom reports, and data visualization tools. Export results in multiple formats or use our API for advanced analysis.
faqSection.faqQuestion4: How many responses can I collect?
faqSection.faqAnswer4: Different plans offer different response limits. Our free plan includes up to 100 responses per survey, while premium plans offer unlimited responses.
